segments.text: I want to say goodbye to everyone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re leaving so soon . When are you off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m catching the nine fifteen train tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how about I come and see you off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You really don ’ t need to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ’ ll miss you . I hope we can see each other again soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so , too . Thank you , Lily . Thank you for everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please say goodbye to the rest of the family for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Take care . I hope you have a good journey .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Remember to look me up if you ’ re ever in Washington .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye , then . Thanks again for everything .
segments.speaker: S1
